sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"校长"之意。
means: headmaster ： 在英国指对中小学校长的一般称呼，尤指私立学校的校长。
principal ： 在英国可指大学校长、院长以及中小学校长，但在美国仅指中小学校长。
president ： 在美国专指大学的校长，在英国指学院院长。

sentence.Network_en: He was headmaster of a public school in the West of England.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是英格兰西部一所公学的校长。

sentence.Network_en: You need a thick skin to be a headmaster.
sentence.Network_cn: 要当校长，你就得脸皮厚一些。

sentence.Network_en: The headmaster is waiting for someone to own up.
sentence.Network_cn: 校长在等着有人站出来承认。

i chanced to see our old headmaster in the street the other day ., 前几天我碰巧在街上看到了我们的老校长.

entry.def: A headmaster is a man who is the head teacher of a school.

auth_sentence.content: The headmaster was addressing a hangdog group of boys.
auth_sentence.res_content: The headmaster was addressing a hangdog group of boys.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The headmaster was addressing a hangdog group of boys.

auth_sentence.content: The Gangster Headmaster takes a tough line on truancy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Gangster Headmaster takes a tough line on truancy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Gangster Headmaster takes a tough line on truancy.

auth_sentence.content: I was caned that week by Headmaster Rose.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was caned that week by Headmaster Rose.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was caned that week by Headmaster Rose.

Sentence.sentence: Tony Little, headmaster of Eton, warned that boys were being faded by the British education system because it had become too focused on girls.

means.word_mean: 私立学校的男校长;（尤指私立学校的）校长

sentences.en: The headmaster is marking the papers.

jushi.english: John had armed himself with an excuse before he went to see the headmaster.
jushi.chinese: 约翰在去见校长之前就已找好借口。

jushi.english: The decision by the headmaster was called in question by some of the teachers who thought it unnecessarily harsh.
jushi.chinese: 有些教师对校长的决定存有异议,他们认为没有必要那么严厉。
